reference.title: cxxFriendTemplateParameters
reference.shortdesc: Container for elements to describe each of the template parameters of a function template that is also a friend function.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFriendTemplateParameters> element contains child elements that describe the template parameters of a friend function template.

example.title: Example
example.p: Then function templateFunction would have the following cxxFriendTemplateParameters element:
example.codeblock: <cxxFriendTemplateParameters> <cxxFriendTemplateParameter> <cxxFriendTemplateParameterType>typename T</cxxFriendTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the first function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxFriendTemplateParameter> <cxxFriendTemplateParameter> <cxxFriendTemplateParameterType>typename U</cxxFriendTemplateParameterType> <apiDefNote>The type of the second function object. </apiDefNote> </cxxFriendTemplateParameter> </cxxFriendTemplateParameters>
